channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：中国阿里巴巴第三季度营收低于分析师预期，受全球第二大经济体严峻的零售环境和艰难的经济复苏的影响
item.description: WATCH: China's Alibaba fell short of analysts' third-quarter revenue estimates, impacted by a challenging retail environment and a struggling economic recovery in the world's second-largest economy reut.rs/49uYU6J

item.title: 观看：风力发电公司对来年的前景持谨慎态度，承认该行业面临项目延期、设备问题和通货膨胀等挑战
item.description: WATCH: Wind power companies presented a cautious outlook for the upcoming year, acknowledging challenges within an industry facing project delays, equipment issues and inflation reut.rs/3OC5oZj

item.title: 观看：得益于重新评估公司股权投资带来的 10 亿美元税前净收益，优步第四季度利润增长近两倍，达到 14.3 亿美元
item.description: WATCH: Uber's profit nearly tripled to $1.43 billion in the fourth quarter, thanks to a $1 billion net pre-tax benefit from re-evaluation of the company's equity investments reut.rs/3HTSwdn

item.title: 在社交媒体公司 Snap 公布第四季度营收低于华尔街预期后，该公司股价下跌超过三分之一。更多信息
item.description: Shares of Snap lost more than one-third of their value after the social media company reported fourth-quarter revenue that fell short of Wall Street's expectations. Read more: reut.rs/3uhEkI3

item.title: 独家报道：美国数据安全软件公司 Cohesity 告诉 @路透社，它已同意收购 Veritas 的数据保护业务，合并后的实体价值将达 70 亿美元。更多信息，请点击此处：
item.description: Exclusive: US data security software firm Cohesity told @Reuters it has agreed to acquire Veritas's data protection business in a deal that would value the combined entity at $7 billion. More here: reut.rs/3HTbnoK

item.title: 观看：标准普尔500指数收盘创下历史新高，投资者对美国财报的整体强劲表示赞赏，并密切关注美联储的评论，以寻找利率方面的线索
item.description: WATCH: The S&P 500 closed at a record high as investors applauded overall strength in US earnings and monitored Federal Reserve comments for clues on interest rates reut.rs/3OzGFEW

item.title: 马来西亚在 2023 年至 2024 年 2 月间追回 1MDB 资产逾 400 万美元
item.description: Malaysia recovers over $4 mln in 1MDB assets between 2023 and Feb 2024 reut.rs/3uhnkBH

item.title: 永利因拉斯维加斯和澳门市场强劲而实现盈利
item.description: Wynn profit beats on Vegas, Macau strength reut.rs/3Syy0nh

item.title: 永明人寿季度核心利润高于预期，原因是个人保险需求旺盛
item.description: Sun Life's quarterly core profit tops estimates on demand for personal insurance reut.rs/3OCJVj0

item.title: 科蒂推出高端香水和化妆品，推动季度收入增长
item.description: Coty's premium fragrances, cosmetics launches drive quarterly revenue beat reut.rs/49r05Ur

item.title: 承保和投资回报增加，保险公司恒峰集团利润激增
item.description: Insurer Everest Group's profit surges on stronger underwriting, investment returns reut.rs/483HvRr

item.title: 波音公司的一位高层管理人员敦促供应商保持当前 737 生产计划的进度，但承认联邦航空管理局正在对该公司的 737 MAX 生产线进行审计，这可能会迫使该计划发生变化。
item.description: A top Boeing executive urged suppliers to maintain the pace of the current 737 production schedule, but acknowledged that an ongoing Federal Aviation Administration audit of the company's 737 MAX production line could force changes to the schedule reut.rs/42v3gYW

item.title: 全州保险因保费增加、巨灾损失减少而实现超预期利润
item.description: Allstate tops profit estimates on higher premiums, lower catastrophe losses reut.rs/3OBwijQ

item.title: 观看：从 Facebook 计划如何帮助您识别人工智能图像，到为什么机器人会让经济学家变得过时，我们汇总了本周人工智能革命的热点新闻
item.description: WATCH: From how Facebook plans to help you spot AI images, to why bots could make economists obsolete, we round up the week's top stories from the AI revolution

item.title: 巴西数字银行 Inter&Co 第四季度利润超预期
item.description: Brazil digital bank Inter&Co beats profit forecasts in fourth quarter reut.rs/4btklqs

item.title: 迪士尼将以 15 亿美元入股 Epic Games
item.description: Disney to take $1.5 billion stake in Epic Games reut.rs/483GdG5

item.title: 全球人寿保险公司（Globe Life）利润因承保和投资回报增加而增长
item.description: Globe Life profit rises on stronger underwriting, investment returns reut.rs/487PtJk

item.title: 观看：华尔街主要股指上涨，基准股指标准普尔500指数创下收盘纪录新高，投资者对美国整体盈利强劲表示赞赏
item.description: WATCH: Wall Street's major stock indexes rose, with the benchmark S&P 500 registering a record closing high as investors applauded overall strength in US earnings reut.rs/3OzGFEW

item.title: 观看：中国阿里巴巴第三季度营收未达分析师预期，零售市场疲软和中国经济复苏乏力令这家电子商务公司受到冲击
item.description: WATCH: China's Alibaba missed analysts' estimates for third-quarter revenue as the e-commerce company was hurt by softness in the retail market and China's weak economic recovery reut.rs/49uYU6J

item.title: 商务支付公司 Fleetcor 因支出增加而利润增长
item.description: Business payments firm Fleetcor profit rises on higher spending reut.rs/487OKrA

item.title: 观看：领先的风电集团对未来一年的前景作出了冷静的展望。这些公司表示，该行业面临项目延期、设备问题和通货膨胀等问题
item.description: WATCH: Leading wind power groups provided a sober outlook for the year ahead. The companies said the sector is confronted with project delays, equipment issues and inflation reut.rs/3OC5oZj

item.title: KKR 房贷房地产投资信托基金股息下调后股价跌至四年新低
item.description: KKR Mortgage REIT shares sink to 4-year low after dividend slash reut.rs/3OYdvjh

item.title: 观看：随着用户留存率的提高，同时受益于会员制、企业差旅和广告等举措，优步首次实现了作为上市公司的年度净利润
item.description: WATCH: Uber posted its first annual net profit as a public company as user retention improved, and also benefiting from initiatives like memberships, corporate travel and advertising reut.rs/3HTSwdn

item.title: 尽管息差 "略有 "下降，意大利 BPER 公司 2024 年收入仍保持稳定
item.description: Italy's BPER sees 2024 income stable despite "slightly" lower interest margin reut.rs/3HNIXg2

item.title: Snapchat 的所有者 Snap 的第四季度业绩与竞争对手强劲的广告销售额形成鲜明对比，这表明在经济不确定的情况下，广告客户被规模更大、更稳定的公司所吸引。更多信息
item.description: Snapchat owner Snap's fourth-quarter results contrast rivals' strong ad sales, suggesting advertisers are drawn to larger, more stable companies in an uncertain economy. Read more: reut.rs/3uhEkI3

item.title: Paycom 预测第一季度收入低于预期，任命联席首席执行官
item.description: Paycom forecasts Q1 revenue below estimates; names co-CEO reut.rs/3uq9ZXC

item.title: 抵押贷款市场不景气，Equifax 2024 年收入低于预期
item.description: Equifax sees 2024 revenue below estimates amid mortgage market slump reut.rs/495ZdFb

item.title: 永利因拉斯维加斯和澳门市场强劲而实现盈利
item.description: Wynn profit beats on Vegas, Macau strength reut.rs/49qPQ2v

item.title: 独家报道巴拿马运河至少在四月前不计划限制过境
item.description: Exclusive: Panama Canal does not plan transit restrictions at least until April reut.rs/3SvdB2K

item.title: 永明人寿季度核心利润高于预期，原因是个人保险需求旺盛
